profile.name: Richard Schneeman
profile.bio: Ruby core contributor. Learn how to contribute to open source with my app CodeTriage (free) and my book How to Open Source (paid), links below 👇🏻

analysis.career_trajectory: This developer has been actively contributing to various open-source projects, including Heroku's Cloud Native Buildpacks and Puma. They have also been involved in discussions on Ruby and Rust-related topics, showcasing their expertise in multiple programming languages.

technical_obsessions.evidence: Their contributions to the project, such as fixing issues and implementing new features, demonstrate their interest in this area.
Their discussions on Puma's development and testing processes highlight their understanding of the library's inner workings.
Their comments on Ruby and Rust-related issues, such as bundler and sqlite3, show their familiarity with these languages.

comment_analytics.communication_style: This developer is knowledgeable and experienced in multiple areas, often providing insightful comments and suggestions on open-source projects.

match_profile.similar_user_traits: A developer who is also interested in Cloud Native Buildpacks and Puma, with a strong background in Ruby and Rust.
conversation_starters: What are some common challenges you face when working with Cloud Native Buildpacks?
How do you approach testing and debugging Puma?
Can you share your experience with bundler and sqlite3?
